isis.stitle: International® DT 466E, DT 466, 530, 530E, and HT 530 Diesel Engines - Torque Information - General Torque Guidelines - Service Procedure

svcproc.title: Service Procedure

caution.para: To avoid engine damage, do not substitute fasteners. Original equipment standard hardware is defined as Class 10.9 metric or Grade 8 standard coarse thread bolts and nuts and hardened flat washers (Rockwell "C" 38 to 45), all phosphate coated.

svcproc.para: The standard torque charts provide the tightening torque for general purpose applications using original equipment standard hardware as listed in the Parts Catalog for the application involved.

note.para: Visually inspect parts for cleanliness and obvious defects prior to assembly.
